p: Microinjected oocytes were either cultured to blastocyst stage, or allowed to rest for 1 hr then transferred laparoscopically [50] to foster mothers primed by intramuscular injection of 0.2 ml Receptal (Intervet) 3 to 7 hrs previously. Pregnancies were either terminated at day 15 to examine fetuses, or allowed to proceed to term. Offspring were delivered normally and their genotype was determined at approximately 3 weeks of age.
